original: @346a ` // rma bya chen mo las gsungs pa'i smon lam dang bden tshig bzhugs /
analyzed: @346a ` // rma bya chen mo las gsungs pa'i smon lam dang bden tshig bzhugs /
translated: The Aspiration and Words of Truth as Taught in the Great Peacock Queen Tantra

original: # // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: # // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the blessed buddhas!

original: rgyal ba rnam gzigs mya ngan 'tshang la gnas //
analyzed: rgyal ba rnam gzigs mya ngan 'tshang la gnas //
translated: The Victor Vipashyin dwelt at the foot of the A콑oka tree;

original: rgyal ba gtsug tor padma dkar po'i drung //
analyzed: rgyal ba gtsug tor padma dkar po'i drung //
translated: The Victor 콐ikhin, at the foot of the white lotus;

original: thams cad skyob pa s'a la'i drung na gnas //
analyzed: thams cad skyob pa s'a la'i drung na gnas //
translated: Vi콑vabh콞, at the foot of the s캐la tree;

original: bram ze 'khor ba 'jig ni shir sha'i drung //
analyzed: bram ze 'khor ba 'jig ni shir sha'i drung //
translated: Krakucchanda, the brahmin, at the foot of the 콑ir캶攷므 tree;

original: sangs rgyas gser thub au dum+w'a ra'i drung //游댷'od srungs n+ya gro dha yi drung na gnas //
analyzed: sangs rgyas gser thub au dum+w'a ra'i drung // 'od srungs n+ya gro dha yi drung na gnas //
translated: Kanakamuni, at the foot of the udumbara tree;游댷K캐콑yapa, at the foot of the banyan tree;

original: sh'akya thub mchog khyad par gnas drung du //
analyzed: sh'akya thub mchog khyad par gnas drung du //
translated: And the supreme 콐캐kyamuni, at the foot of the tree of awakening.

original: phyin nas byang chub thob gyur goo ta ma //
analyzed: phyin nas byang chub thob gyur goo ta ma //
translated: Having gone there, Gautama attained awakening.

original: sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul chen po de dag la //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul chen po de dag la //
translated: To those buddhas of great miracles,游댷The gods who have perfect faith,

original: mngon par dad pa'i lha gang 'khod pa dag / lha rnams de dag yid dga' mgur gyur nas //
analyzed: mngon par dad pa'i lha gang 'khod pa dag / lha rnams de dag yid dga' mgur gyur nas //
translated: The gods who are delighted and joyful,

original: rtag tu dge zhing zhi bar 'gyur bar byos /
analyzed: rtag tu dge zhing zhi bar 'gyur bar byos /
translated: May they always be virtuous and peaceful.

original: // / sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: // / sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the buddhas!

original: rkang gnyis khyed cag bde legs shog / rkang bzhi khyed cag bde legs shog / lam du zhugs rnams bde legs shog / phyir 'ong dag kyang bde legs shog / mtshan mo bde legs nyin bde legs //
analyzed: rkang gnyis khyed cag bde legs shog / rkang bzhi khyed cag bde legs shog / lam du zhugs rnams bde legs shog / phyir 'ong dag kyang bde legs shog / mtshan mo bde legs nyin bde legs //
translated: May the night be well! May the day be well!

original: nyi ma'i gung la bde legs shing //
analyzed: nyi ma'i gung la bde legs shing //
translated: May the midday be well!游댷May you all be well!游댷May you not commit any evil!

original: khyed cag kun du bde legs shog / de dag sdig par ma gyur cig / nyi ma thams cad dge ba yin //
analyzed: khyed cag kun du bde legs shog / de dag sdig par ma gyur cig / nyi ma thams cad dge ba yin //
translated: May all days be virtuous!

original: rgyu skra thams cad bzang po yin //
analyzed: rgyu skra thams cad bzang po yin //
translated: May all the stars be auspicious!

original: sangs rgyas thams cad rdzu 'phrul che //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad rdzu 'phrul che //
translated: May all the buddhas have great miraculous powers!

original: dgra bcom thams cad zag pa zad //
analyzed: dgra bcom thams cad zag pa zad //
translated: May all the arhats have exhausted defilements!游댷By this true word, may everything be auspicious!

original: bden pa'i tshig 'dis kun du bde legs su gyur cig / rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo las gsungs pa'i smon lam dang bden tshig rdzogs so /
analyzed: bden pa'i tshig 'dis kun du bde legs su gyur cig / rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo las gsungs pa'i smon lam dang bden tshig rdzogs so /
translated: The aspirations and true words spoken in the Great Peacock Queen of Spells are complete.
